document.full_text: a 22-year-old navy submarine crewman appeared in magistrate's court in southampton on monday, charged with killing one of the vessel's senior officers and wounding three crewmen in a burst of automatic rifle fire.
document.title: europe: britain: sub crewman arraigned
lines_and_colors: a 22-year-old navy submarine crewman appeared in magistrate's court in southampton on monday, charged with killing one of the vessel's senior officers and wounding three crewmen in a burst of automatic rifle fire.
